mediaType.description: Uniquely identifies the artifact for computer consumption.

title.description: Represents the name of the type displayed for human consumption.

description.description: Provides a short description of the type for human consumption.

url.description: Provides additional details, intended for consumers of the type.

spec.description: References a spec, providing additional details on the type.

tools.description: Provides a collection of tools that may be used with artifact type.

title.description: Represents the name of the tool, displayed for human consumption.

url.description: Links to a page where users can download the tool.

configSchemaReference.description: provides a schema reference for the artifact config object.

layerMediaTypes.description: Represents one or more layer mediaTypes, defined by the artifact.

mediaType.description: Represents a valid layer `mediaTypes`for the artifact.
